mapper.sql: uf_id, open_id, page_type, relate_item, choose_item, pro_describe, submit_date
mapper.select:
select
from t_user_feedback
page_type=#{pageType}
and trim(replace(choose_item,' ','')) like trim(replace ('%' #{chooseItem,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' ,' ',''))
mapper.insert: insert into t_user_feedback (uf_id, open_id, page_type, relate_item, choose_item, pro_describe, submit_date) values (#{ufId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{pageType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{relateItem,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{chooseItem,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proDescribe,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into t_user_feedback
uf_id,
open_id,
page_type,
relate_item,
choose_item,
pro_describe,
submit_date,
#{ufId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{openId,jdbcType=CHAR},

mapper.update:
update t_user_feedback
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR},
page_type = #{pageType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
relate_item = #{relateItem,jdbcType=CHAR},
choose_item = #{chooseItem,jdbcType=CHAR},
pro_describe = #{proDescribe,jdbcType=CHAR},
submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where uf_id = #{ufId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user_feedback set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR}, page_type = #{pageType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, relate_item = #{relateItem,jdbcType=CHAR}, choose_item = #{chooseItem,jdbcType=CHAR}, pro_describe = #{proDescribe,jdbcType=CHAR}, submit_date = #{submitDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where uf_id = #{ufId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
